extendedInfo.description: The Ultra Measure Master calculator for your Android smartphone is built with the same features and functions, and the same core engine that powers the industry-standard advanced construction-math calculators from Calculated Industries. No learning curve -- just one powerful, easy-to-use calculator/converter app, giving you the power to solve U.S. and metric unit conversions.Forget complex scientific calculators, memorizing conversion formulas or using tablesâinstantly calculate with more than 400 conversion combinations using 60 built-in standard and metric units. The Ultra Measure Master is especially helpful for those working in federal DOT environments where frequent metric to foot-inch conversions and âdual unitâ reporting is required.Ideal for Engineers, Architects, Designers, Contractors/Builders, Draftspersons, Excavation/Highway Contractors, Scientists, Pharmaceutical Lab Techs, Purchasing, Importers/Exporters, Students (or anyone who needs fast, easy, professional unit conversions). â¢ Work in and convert between all building dimensional formats: feet-inch-fractions, inch fractions, yards, decimal feet (10ths, 100ths), decimal inches and metric (m, cm, mm)â¢ Easily calculate linear, area and volume measurementsâ¢ Calculate dry and liquid weight per volume measurementsâ¢ Solve for velocity, flow rate, pressure, temperature measurements FEATURES:â¢ Created by Calculated Industries, the originator of the award-winning Construction Master calculatorsâ¢ Built-in help â just press and hold the desired key for full, clear definitions, explanations and examples of keystrokesDimensional Math and Conversionsâ¢ More than 60 Standard and Metric (SI) units built-inâ¢ Over 400 conversion combinationsâ¢ Works in and converts betweenâ¢ Feet-Inch-Fractionâ¢ Inch Fractionâ¢ Yardsâ¢ Decimal Feet (10ths, 100ths), Decimal Inchesâ¢ Full Metric (m, cm, mm)Dedicated Functions Help You Measure and Calculate:â¢ Linear â¢ Feet-Inch-Fractionsâ¢ Yards, Milesâ¢ Decimal Feet/Inchâ¢ Millimeters, Centimeters, Meters and Kilometersâ¢ Area Converterâ¢ Feet, Inch, Yards, Acres, Miles â¢ Millimeters, Centimeters, Meters, Hectares and Kilometers â¢ Volume Converterâ¢ Feet, Inch, Yards, Milesâ¢ Millimeters, Centimeters, Meters, Kilometersâ¢ Gallons, Liters, Fluid Ounces â¢ Acre-Feet and Board Feetâ¢ Weight Measurementsâ¢ Pounds, Dry Ounces, Tonsâ¢ Metric Tons, Grams and Kilogramsâ¢ Weight per Volumeâ¢ Tons per Cubic Yardâ¢ Pounds per Cubic Yardâ¢ Kilograms per Cubic Meter â¢ Linear Velocityâ¢ Inches per Secondâ¢ Feet per Secondâ¢ Feet per Minuteâ¢ Miles per Hourâ¢ Millimeters per Second/Minute â¢ Meters per Second/Minuteâ¢ Kilometers per Hour â¢ Flow Rateâ¢ Ounces per Secondâ¢ Gallons per Minuteâ¢ Milliliters per Secondâ¢ Liters per Secondâ¢ Pressureâ¢ Pressure; Pounds per Square Inch (PSI)â¢ Pressure; Pounds per Square Foot (PSF)â¢ Kilopascal, Megapascal and Barsâ¢ Bending Momentâ¢ Inch-Pounds, Foot-Pounds and Newton-Metersâ¢ Temperature Measurementsâ¢ Fahrenheit (Â°F) and Celsius (Â°C)Special Functionsâ¢ Entry Editing Backspace Key â with a swipe of a fingerâ¢ Haptic Feedback (optional)â¢ Calculate Cost per Unit: Solve unit cost and pricingâ¢ Paperless Tapeâ¢ Board Feetâ¢ Memory functionâ¢ User-Definable Preferences â set custom reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good, but would like to see more liquid convert. Options like pints/quarts/cups, ect...
reviews.author: Steve Andrukaitis

reviews.title: Just Okay
reviews.comment: What\'s New: BNG? Isn\'t that a bit vague? This app serves its purpose, not sure if I would have spent the money on it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ultra measure master
reviews.comment: I have become completely dependent on my 10 year old one and have considered buying another so I wouldn\'t have to carry it back and forth.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Business Owner
reviews.comment: Great application. I use this app quite often when I do not have the physical calculator at hand.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect app.
reviews.comment: I never spent the cash in a real one, kept buying cheap walmart construction calcs. This app is cheaper than those, and loaded with more capabilities than I will ever use. Well worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NOT ICS compatible...
reviews.comment: I maybe wrong about what UMM is compatible with slightly. I tried to install it on my tablet running ICS. I couldn\'t get past the INTRODUCTION page though. I installed it to my phone running on Froyo and had no issues. So I\'m not sure if it\'s not tablet friendly or not ICS friendly.   Other than install issues this is a great app. It works like it\'s supposed to and has help easily accessible.
reviews.author: A Google User
